snippet: President Xi Jinping told Communist Party officials that China would be nice to its neighbors in Asia but that he would be relentless in promoting his idea of China’s rejuvenation onto the world stage.
abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping addresses Communist Party officials, saying China poses no threat to its Asian neighbors but he is committed to bold foreign policy that emphasizes China's resurgence as a global power.
lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping told Communist Party officials that China would be nice to its neighbors in Asia but that he would be relentless in promoting his idea of China’s rejuvenation onto the world stage.

headline.main: Leader Asserts China’s Growing Importance on Global Stage
headline.print_headline: Leader Asserts China’s Growing Importance on Global Stage
